title: CJ McCollum | Ep 76 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: CJ McCollum | Ep 76 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
On episode of 76 of ALL THE SMOKE, Blazers guard CJ McCollum joins the boys. CJ talks playing with Damian Lillard and learning from Carmelo Anthony. Plus, he reflects on his college career and looks back at Lehigh's infamous upset of Duke in the 2012 NCAA Tournament.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
